body_html:
Would you like to try to add an entry for the docs for it?
I think you need to add entries in this file (just below size for example) and in this file, following the doc for size, and that should be all I think.
You can compile the docs locally with make html in the docs folder

Would you like to try to add an entry for the docs for it?

body:
Would you like to try to add an entry for the docs for it?
I think you need to add entries in [this file](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/docs/source/tensors.rst) (just below `size` for example) and  in [this file, following the doc for size](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/_tensor_docs.py#L1378-L1388), and that should be all I think.
You can compile the docs locally with [`make html` in the docs folder](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/tree/master/docs)
